response.original_title: Bombay Bicycle Club ‘Live at Alexandra Palace Park’
response.overview: On 12 July 2024, Bombay Bicycle Club returned to London for their 1hr 30+ headline performance at Alexandra Palace Park. Britain's indie darlings took to the outdoors to play feel-good classics hand-picked from their six albums, including 'Always Like This', 'Luna', 'Meditate', 'Shuffle', and 'Eat, Sleep, Wake'. Jack Steadman, Jamie MacColl, Suren de Saram, and Ed Nash blend folk, electronica, and world music with their signature indie rock style throughout their upbeat 20-song set. Then, in an atmospheric twist, the band welcomed guest stars Rae Morris and Nilüfer Yanya to deliver an unforgettable experience against the London skyline.
response.tagline: Bombay Bicycle Club deliver a euphoric 90-minute set at Alexandra Palace Park. Featuring fan-favorites and guest performances, the show is captured in 4K UHD with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos.
response.title: Bombay Bicycle Club ‘Live at Alexandra Palace Park’

results.name: Bombay Bicycle Club ‘Live at Alexandra Palace Park’ (Eat, Sleep, Wake ) [On Air]
